SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.mx

Class MXResolver

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mx.MXResolver
public class MXResolver extends Object
MXResolver encapsulates MX record resolution with MTA-STS preference.

Resolution order: 1) Attempt to resolve MTA-STS Strict MX records. 2) If none, fall back to regular MX records via DNS client.

    Loop through the domains, resolve the MX records, compute a hash for each ordered list of MX records and group them into MXRoute objects unique to each hash while keeping track of the MX servers and the domains they belong to.

  • Method Details

    • resolveMx

      public List<DnsRecord> resolveMx(String domain)
      Resolves MX records for a domain, preferring MTA-STS Strict MX.
      Parameters:
      domain - Domain to resolve.
      Returns:
      List of DnsRecord, possibly empty if none found.

    • resolveRoutes

      public List<MXRoute> resolveRoutes(List<String> domains)
      Loop through the domains, resolve the MX records, compute a hash for each ordered list of MX records and group them into MXRoute objects unique to each hash while keeping track of the MX servers and the domains they belong to.

    • safeName

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Normalized name.

    • canonicalize

      private static String canonicalize(List<DnsRecord> mxRecords)
      Creates a canonical string representation of the MX records list.
      Parameters:
      mxRecords - List of DnsRecord objects.
      Returns:
      Canonical string in the format "priority:name|priority:name|..."

      Computes SHA-256 hash of the input data and returns it as a hexadecimal string.

      Returns:
